The '''Turtle Cape''' is a personal [[cape]].

== Distribution ==
This cape was given to billyK_ for his suggestion of turtles, which was implemented into the game.<ref>[https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/7veimo/turtle_shoutout_to_billyk_as_suspected_theres_a/ Turtle shoutout to billyK_! As suspected, there's a cape waiting for you on your Minecraft profile =)]</ref> It was also given to some Mojang-owned accounts for endpoint testing.
